puppeteer:Reinforcements.NAME: Reinforcements
puppeteer:Reinforcements.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Add !M! puppeteer:Summon_Shanghai into your hand.

puppeteer:SummonShanghai.NAME: Summon Shanghai
puppeteer:SummonShanghai.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL puppeteer:Summon a puppeteer:Shanghai_Doll. NL Exhaust.
